meta.title: Charles GOEDEFROIT
meta.description: IT Developer in HPC, Web, Android.

home.title: Hello and welcome,
home.description: My name is Charles Goedefroit, I am %s years old. I am passionate about IT, electronics, technology and science. I really like space, video games and sci-fi. This portfolio allows you to see my skills and my projects.

about.content:
I love so much space, video games, technology and sci-fi.

I have always been fascinated by the world around us. I'm seeking to understand how it works.

When I was young, I looked into electronics. In particular by making small circuits and by disassembling or modifying toys.

As soon as I got a computer, I quickly wondered how it works. I explored all the files and all the features of Windows and then discovered the wonderful world of Linux.

In all of my research, I discovered programming and started to learn JAVA, HTML, PHP and JavaScript on my own. Little by little, I became passionate about it.

After the baccalaureate. I went on to prepare a BTS SIO (French Superior Technician's Certificate IT Service for Organizations) to find out more. I expanded my knowledge in object programming, I learned how to organize my projects, I discovered languages, protocols and software during my studies and internship periods. I also learned to use very practical tools like MERISE, UML…

I am currently in the 2nd year of a master's degree in computer science at the University of Bordeaux.
